template:
{% set content=extractSample["$content"] %}

General information

{% if content.general.metadata.date %} {% endif %} {% if content.general.metadata.collector %} {% endif %} {% if content.general.metadata.departament %} {% endif %} {% if content.general.metadata.town %} {% endif %} {% if content.general.metadata.estate %} {% endif %} {% if content.general.metadata.terrainShape %} {% endif %} {% if content.general.metadata.slope %} {% endif %}
Date {{rendertype(content.general.metadata.date, "Date")}}
Collector {{rendertype(content.general.metadata.collector)}}
Departament {{rendertype(content.general.metadata.departament)}}
Town {{rendertype(content.general.metadata.town)}}
Estate {{rendertype(content.general.metadata.estate)}}
Terrain shape {{rendertype(content.general.metadata.terrainShape)}}
Terrain slope {{rendertype(content.general.metadata.slope)}}

Identifier

{% if content.identifier.taxon.id %} {% endif %} {% if content.identifier.taxon.family %} {% endif %} {% if content.identifier.taxon.gender%} {% endif %} {% if content.identifier.taxon.specie %} {% endif %}
Taxon ID {{rendertype(content.identifier.taxon.id)}}
Family {{rendertype(content.identifier.taxon.family)}}
Gender {{rendertype(content.identifier.taxon.gender)}}
Specie {{rendertype(content.identifier.taxon.specie)}}

Extract information

{% for i in 0..content.samplePreparation.solventProportion.length-1 %} {% endfor %}
Abbreviation: {{content.samplePreparation.abbreviation}}
Contact time: {{content.samplePreparation.contactTime}}
Extracted mass: {{content.samplePreparation.extractedMass}}
Method: {{content.samplePreparation.method}}
Proportion: {{content.samplePreparation.solventProportion[i].proportion}}
Solvent: {{content.samplePreparation.solventProportion[i].solvent}}
{% for i in 0..(content.samplePreparation.tlc.length - 1) %}

{{rendertype(content.samplePreparation.tlc[i].name)}}

{% if content.samplePreparation.tlc[i] %} {% if content.samplePreparation.tlc[i].file %} {% endif %} {% endif %}
{{rendertype(content.samplePreparation.tlc[i].file, {width:200, height:200}, 'image')}}
{% endfor %}

Fraction information

{% if content.samplePreparation.fraction.amount %} {% endif %} {% if content.samplePreparation.fraction.yield %} {% endif %} {% if content.samplePreparation.fraction.abbreviation %} {% endif %} {% if content.samplePreparation.fraction.protocol %} {% endif %} {% for i in 0..content.samplePreparation.fraction.solventProportion.length-1 %} {% endfor %}
Amount: {{content.samplePreparation.fraction.amount}}
Yield: {{content.samplePreparation.fraction.yield}}
Extracted mass: {{content.samplePreparation.fraction.abbreviation}}
Protocolo: {{content.samplePreparation.fraction.protocol}}
Proportion: {{content.samplePreparation.fraction.solventProportion[i].proportion}}
Solvent: {{content.samplePreparation.fraction.solventProportion[i].solvent}}
{% for i in 0..(content.samplePreparation.tlc.length - 1) %}

{{rendertype(content.samplePreparation.fraction.tlc[i].name)}}

{% if content.samplePreparation.fraction.tlc[i] %} {% if content.samplePreparation.fraction.tlc[i].file %} {% endif %} {% endif %}
{{rendertype(content.samplePreparation.fraction.tlc[i].file, {width:200, height:200}, 'image')}}
{% endfor %}
